Credential resolved via connection alias or credential alias. This can be used in conjunction with any cmd-let which support credential parameter eg. New-PSSession -credential $cred # $log_info mid property "mid.property.powershell.log_info" set on instance to enable debugging. So it's a flag available to act on and add any verbose logging if they want to in their script if($svcName){ invoke-command -ScriptBlock {Get-Service -Name $svcName | format-table -autosize} } else { invoke-command -ScriptBlock {Get-Service | format-table -autosize} }c54323fa3721030003a08fb77e41f16esys_hub_step_instance63ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e1396199a20sys_variable_valuenick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36b3ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e139619ac0nick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36define_connection_inline4ecf1b7a3721030003a08fb77e41f149sys_hub_step_instance63ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e1396199a160sys_variable_valuenick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36b7ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e139619ab0nick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36{}2183a3fa3721030003a08fb77e41f1c2sys_hub_step_instance63ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e1396199a100sys_variable_valuenick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36ffed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e139619aa0nick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36427709a60a0006bc7d2904e99132532d2046cd992f201300a09a839fb18c956dsys_hub_step_instance63ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e1396199a92sys_variable_valuenick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36ffed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e139619ab0nick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:3635aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375306d63c25f101300a09a2abd7f466627application63ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e1396199anick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:3637ed5ea5dbb01490b8ae8d7e139619aa0nick.ryan2020-05-15 17:17:36var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_486f577a3721030003a08fb77e41f1d6

Credential resolved via connection alias or credential alias. This can be used in conjunction with any cmd-let which support credential parameter eg. New-PSSession -credential $cred # $log_info mid property "mid.property.powershell.log_info" set on instance to enable debugging.
